messages.subject: List of Pages (no pun intended)
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a list of pages (kosho) of big figures, whose names I ve encountered. Name of the big figure comes first. Kondou Isami-- Inoue Taisuke (Genzaburo s
messages.messageBody:
Here is a list of pages (kosho) of big figures, whose names I've
encountered. Name of the big figure comes first.

Kondou Isami-- Inoue Taisuke (Genzaburo's nephew)
Hijikata Toshizo- Ichimura Tetsunosuke
Matsudaira Katamori- Takamine Hideo
Matsudaira Sadaaki- Tatsumi Kanzaburo (aka Tatsumi Naofumi)

Of all of these pages, Inoue Taisuke and Ichimura Tetsunosuke would have
known each other very well, and Takamine Hideo and Tatsumi Kanzaburo might
have at least seen each other if not interacted.

Also, I know of photos exisiting for all but Tetsunosuke.

-M.

messages.subject: Fujita Goro and Ulcers and what does it all really mean?
messages.msgSnippet: I read a bit on ulcers summer 2005 and stopped when it got complicated with genetics, brain chemistry and the new nobel prize winning discovery which points to
messages.messageBody:
I read a bit on ulcers summer 2005 and stopped when it got complicated
with genetics, brain chemistry and the new nobel prize winning discovery
which points to ulcers as being an infectious disease caused by a
bacteria of some sort (link which explains this discovery is in the
document below)

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/SaitouUlcers.htm

I decided to spend a couple of hours typing this because one of my
older much loved, albeit annoying co-workers is an ulcer patient. He
DOES FIT these personality traits...and to top it off he is the "rare"
kind of ulcer patient. The juvenile ulcer patient...and to make it
more interesting...he's a leftie. After grilling him with questions I
formed from my superficial study I knew that there is "something to"
these kinds of people--after all ulcers have mental causes.

ok my mini fangirl essay will not and cannot prove that Fujita Goro was
1) a juvenile ulcer patient
however I think that there are some things in the essay which will be
of interest to some people

I can't upload it to http://www.shinsengumihq.com because unlike the
Okita + TB essay
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/TBandOkita.htm

this ulcer essay was based on notes I typed without page numbers,
HOWEVER I do know exactly which books everything came from and the
author's names are noted after quotes

often, shinsengumihq.com will use the good old MLA citation system in
an attempt to maintain information integrity http://www.mla.org/style

and because this particular piece lacks page numbers wwhich would
allow verification I decided not to upload it (T_T)

but it is still....interesting...very interesting

if people have questions you can aim me at "badgerturtle" or see me in
the MIRC chat room Bunneh set up...sometimes questions help me recall
a detail I forgot to include
